edu.handong.csee.java.hw3

Class MessageFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.handong.csee.java.hw3.MessageFilter

  • public class MessageFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a MessageFilter class It has methods to classify two type of message(.txt, .csv) I combined two class(reader for .txt, .csv) and put into this class. I apologize for the inconvenience in reading.
    Author:
    JS
